body_content.explanation: in a way that is not bright and strong, especially in colour :
examples: There was a card tied to the ribbon, on which was a palely visible message.
The moonlight shimmered palely on the surface of the lake.

body_content.explanation: (of the face or skin) in a way that has less colour than usual, for example when the person is ill or frightened:
examples: His mother sat palely by the phone until he called.
Her huge glasses drew attention to her palely perfect face.
